body.p:
Covington Ky
Novr 19th 1864
Hon Thos E Bramlette
The bearer Mrs McDermott comes to try and get at your hands the release of her husband from the penitentiary, he was convicted at our last term of Court by circumstantial evidence only

I have known him for 12 years and have had intimate knowledge of his transactions, have always found him honest. never had any reason to think him otherwise, Mr Lewis an old Citizen here and several Gentlemen testified to his previous good character, at his trial

His wife has 5 little children to support now, and shortly will be confined, I really cannot tell how she will be able to get through this winter without the help of her husband, -- and really believing him innocent of the crime, I would sincerely ask of your Excellency to extend to him the Executive Clemency

Very Respectfully yours
John P Noonan
